title: The Queen's Awards for Enterprise - International Trade

details.description: Recognises outstanding achievements in overseas earnings by UK businesses
details.body: This annual award recognises export achievement and outstanding performance in international trading.
details.short_description: Recognises outstanding achievements in overseas earnings by UK businesses
details.eligibility: Businesses must be operating regularly as a unit of the UK economy and have achieved a minimum of Â£100,000 sales each year of their application.
details.additional_information:
Businesses may enter on the following criteria:

  • outstanding achievement resulting in substantial growth in overseas earnings, sustained over 3 years or more
  • continuous achievement resulting in substantial growth in overseas earnings, sustained over 6 years or more
